name: Dragonplate Armor
description: A legendary suit of armor made from the scales of a dragon. It is said to offer unmatched protection and resilience.
looks: The Dragonplate Armor is a massive suit of armor made from dark, metallic scales. It covers the entire body and has an imposing appearance. The scales are intricately patterned and give off a faint glow.

name: Silver Sword
description: A finely crafted sword made from pure silver.
looks: The Silver Sword has a polished silver blade with a curved design. The hilt is wrapped in black leather and has a silver crossguard and pommel.

special_weapon_skils.swordsmanship: Increases damage and accuracy with swords.

name: Flaming Sword
description: A sword enchanted with fire, causing burning damage to enemies.
looks: The Flaming Sword has a straight, double-edged blade made of gleaming steel. The hilt is wrapped in red leather and has a pommel in the shape of a flame.

special_effects.burning: Chance to inflict burning damage on enemies.

name: Adamantium Sword
description: A legendary sword crafted from the rare and incredibly durable metal known as adamantium.
looks: The Adamantium Sword has a long, straight blade with a sharp point and a single-edge. The hilt is wrapped in black leather, and the guard is made of polished silver. The blade has a faint blue glow, indicating the presence of magical enchantments intertwined with the metal.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Has a chance to deal additional elemental damage based on the wielder's affinity.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy iron sword with a sharp blade.
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a single sharp edge. The hilt is made of leather and wrapped with strips of cloth for a secure grip.

special_weapon_skils.sword_skill: Increases damage and accuracy when using swords.

name: Flaming Sword
description: A sword imbued with the power of fire, capable of dealing burning damage to enemies.
looks: The Flaming Sword has a long, steel blade that glows with a fiery red hue. The hilt is wrapped in black leather, and the pommel is shaped like a flaming torch.

special_weapon_skills.weapon_proficiency_sword: Increases damage and accuracy when using swords.

special_effects.burning: Has a chance to ignite enemies, dealing additional fire damage over time.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: A pair of sturdy gauntlets made of steel.
looks: The steel gauntlets are made of solid steel plates that cover the hands and extend to the wrists. They have a textured surface for a better grip and small ventilation holes for airflow.

name: Flaming Sword
description: A sword imbued with the power of fire, causing extra burning damage to enemies.
looks: The Flaming Sword has a blade that appears to be made of pure fire, with flames licking along its edges. The hilt is made of blackened metal, with intricate carvings of flames.

special_weapon_skils.fire_sword: Grants the Fire Sword skill, allowing the wielder to unleash powerful fire-based attacks.

name: Iron Gauntlets
description: Sturdy iron gauntlets that protect the hands and wrists.
looks: The iron gauntlets are made of solid iron plates, with reinforced sections over the knuckles and finger joints. They have leather straps for secure fastening.

name: Dagger of Slicing
description: A small, sharp dagger with a thin blade that is perfect for stealthy attacks.
looks: The Dagger of Slicing has a slender, double-edged blade made of polished steel. The handle is wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip.

name: Steel Chestplate
description: A heavy chestplate made of hardened steel plates, providing excellent protection.
looks: The steel chestplate consists of overlapping steel plates, covering the entire torso. It has a reinforced collar and adjustable buckle straps for a secure fit. The surface of the plates is polished to a mirror-like shine.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Amulet of Vitality
description: An enchanted amulet that enhances the wearer's vitality and fortitude.
looks: The amulet is made of a polished silver metal, with a large translucent gem at the center that glows with a soft green light. The gem is encased in a silver frame with intricate carvings of leaves and vines.

special_effects.vitality_boost: Grants a temporary boost to maximum HP.

name: Silver Ring
description: A simple silver ring adorned with a small gemstone.
looks: The silver ring is made from polished silver and has a small gemstone set in the center. The band is smooth and comfortable to wear.

name: Steel Sword
description: A sturdy sword made of steel
looks: The steel sword has a long, curved blade with a silver tint. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a secure grip.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when wielded.
